paint

Class MyController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.WindowAdapter
      • paint.MyController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.WindowFocusListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.awt.event.WindowStateListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class MyController
extends java.awt.event.WindowAdapter
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener
    Controller für Zeichenbrett Actionlistener: JMenuItems im Frame MouseAdapter: View
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Walter Rafeiner-Magor
